item.title: HTML and CSS only tabs
item.description:
Shortcodes Link to heading

The following content:

{{< tabgroup >}}
{{< tab name="Hello" >}}
Hello World!
{{< /tab >}}

{{< tab name="Goodbye" >}}
Goodbye Everybody!
{{< /tab >}}
{{< /tabgroup >}}

Will generate:

Hello World!
Goodbye Everybody!

Right alignment Link to heading

You can also align the tabs to the right:

{{< tabgroup align="right" >}}
{{< tab name="Hello" >}}
Hello World!
{{< /tab >}}

{{< tab name="Goodbye" >}}
Goodbye Everybody!
{{< /tab >}}
{{< /tabgroup >}}

Giving you this look:

item.title: HTML and CSS only tabs
item.description:
Shortcodes Link to heading

O seguinte conte√∫do:

{{< tabgroup >}}
{{< tab name="Hello" >}}
Hello World!
{{< /tab >}}

{{< tab name="Goodbye" >}}
Goodbye Everybody!
{{< /tab >}}
{{< /tabgroup >}}

Ir√° gerar:

Hello World!
Goodbye Everybody!

Alinhamento √† direita Link to heading

Voc√™ tamb√©m pode alinhas as tabs √† direita:

{{< tabgroup align="right" >}}
{{< tab name="Hello" >}}
Hello World!
{{< /tab >}}

{{< tab name="Goodbye" >}}
Goodbye Everybody!
{{< /tab >}}
{{< /tabgroup >}}

Obtendo o seguinte resultado:

item.title: Mermaid JS support
item.description:
